q: Orlando, 3-1, and will meet the Indiana Pacers in the second round, beginning Monday in Indianapolis.`` I don't know how you can be any more proud of your team,'' Courtney Lee said. I told them this was a great opportunity for us to grow up. Allen Iverson 's doing what great players do. He's making other people better and he is taking responsibility and steps up. I feel good that a young team could respond this way. With Allen Iverson leading the way with 26 points, the Sixers built an 18-point lead by the 7:33 mark of the third quarter.
